keyword: how many calories are in tootsie rolls
title: How Many Calories Are in Tootsie Rolls?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Tootsie Rolls per piece, including carbs, sugars, fat, and full nutrition facts for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Tootsie Rolls?
assumptions: Standard bite-sized Tootsie Roll (11g each), chocolate-flavored caramel candy, no wrappers or additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, flavor variant, manufacturer batch, and storage; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Tootsie Roll contains about 52 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Tootsie Roll with nuts added (per piece)

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Tootsie Roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 52 calories per standard bite-sized piece.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Tootsie Rolls?
faqs.a: About 11g carbs per Tootsie Roll, with 7g sugars and 0g fiber.

faqs.q: Do Tootsie Rolls have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Low fat at 0.5g total (0.3g saturated) and minimal protein at 0.4g per piece.

faqs.q: How many calories in a handful of Tootsie Rolls?
faqs.a: A typical handful (5 pieces) has around 260 calories; portion control is key.
Yes, only 5mg sodium per Tootsie Roll, making them suitable for low-sodium diets.
